name: Executive Intermediary
overview:
We are beginning stage investors; providing a companyâ€™s first line of funding, somtimes known as microfunding or alpha seed capital.

We trend scout and research what is the next important advancement that has not yet blanketed by the marketplace.

We will consider investing ventures in pre-revenue producing entities if they meet requirements for revenue in their next stage of advancement into their respective industry.

â€¢We search for individual and/or companies with solutions to a necessary need in their established industry. â€¢We search for ideas that will either advances technology, marketing or to change industry economics or invent a new way or thought process to effectuate its ideas. â€¢Individual or entities should have an understanding of the industry in which their idea or product will exist; the competitors not only in the marketplace; but other individuals or entities that may be designing new ideas for their respective industry. â€¢Beginners make a lot of mistakes. Entities should have some of the basic management roles already laid out; we do not review or fund ideas from an excel or MS Word document without a role and where the entity or individual is headed with their respective idea. â€¢We will consider investments in several fields, including technology such as wireless (mobiles and telephony), biotechnology, energy solutions, “GREEN”, Web Apps & IPHONE (R); Organic and social networking to name a few. â€¢Your submitted (see contact us) ideas/descriptions must have an ability to create a revenue stream that is a large percentage of your costs.
